commit message:
Config: Use https instead of http for the example images.

The server now redirects to https for these, but http to https
redirection doesn't happen with okhttp (used by picasso).
See https://github.com/square/picasso/issues/463#issuecomment-39474692

Revert 'Singleton: Close inputStreamTranslation at the correct scope.'

This reverts commit db7574aa68aff456befbf7a64b467f84d7d9327e.

Singleton: Add comments about reusing the translation input stream.

And add an extra check and close after the for(), mostly just
to please coverity's scan.
